name: Trials of the Colosseum
description:
Trials of the Colosseum is an action arcade-style of game. it is meant to be played casually and features easy to learn controls. The game takes place during a great event called Monty Hall's Colosseum Extravaganza! A party of three adventurers has enlisted in the challenge and seeks its legendary reward. But they must face the greatest foes from across the world to reach their goal. The player must strategize their moves for each round of combat in order to best their opponents. If they don't listen close or learn from their mistakes then certain doom is guaranteed. Venture forth and claim victory!

Take control of three unique heroes and battle your way through the dangers of the colosseum.

Face dangerous monsters in thrilling combat.

Identify the weaknesses of your enemies to be victorious in battle!

Face all bosses the colosseum can throw at you and stand your ground!

All content in Trials of the Colosseum is original content. It was made during the SGDA Spring 2021 Game Jam.
